description:
AKB0048`s next concert is on a planet with a total ban on entertainment, Thundristar.
Expecting armed confrontation with the DES and an unpredictable and violent concert, the understudies are chosen to stand in as a special measure. The 76th generation voices its discontent at the selection of Kanata, Mimori, 76th generation Megumi, and the 77th generation understudies.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sono Na wa, Dare no Mono?
To Whom Does That Name Belong?
その名は, 誰のもの?
